titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reinstate the tax on interest received by foreigners on certain portfolio investments.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/7/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the exemption from tax for interest earned on certain portfolio debt investments and received by nonresident alien individuals and foreign corporations. Repeals the exception to withholding requirements for interest income from certain portfolio debt investments earned by nonresident alien individuals.
